response.overview: A peaceful night envelops a father's sleep, interrupted by the switch on his bedroom light, which announces the end of tranquility. His 10-year-old daughter is scared and can't sleep. What begins as an ordinary situation soon turns into a total nightmare. That innocent sound of the switch would soon become the first note of the tune that will make him descend into madness.
response.tagline: "Dad, I'm scared. I don't want to go back to sleep."
response.title: Vigil
